parameters.toolDescription: Call this tool to schedule an appointment.

values.name: description
values.description: bullet list of session Id, full name, email and summary of appointment

values.name: title
values.description: name of the user and a short summary of appointment

values.name: responses
values.description: Use template: { "name": "", "email": "", "location":  { "value": "inPerson", "optionValue": "" }, "guests": [] }|Ensure output is valid json.

parameters.toolDescription:
=Call this tool to reschedule a user's appointment using a booking id.

# To reschedule an existing booking
* First find the existing booking so that you may obtain the existing booking's booking ID.
* Display this booking ID to the user.
* Use this booking ID to reschedule an existing appointment.
* If an existing booking ID is not found or given, then notify the user that it is not possible to complete their request at this time and they should contact via email.
* when user wants to reschedule an booking, ask for a reason for the rescheduling. Confirm with user before rescheduling an booking.

values.name: booking_id
values.description: the booking id of the appointment

values.name: start
values.description: start datetime of the appointment, for example: "2024-05-30T12:00:00.000Z"

parameters.toolDescription:
Call this tool to cancel a user's existing appointment using a booking id.

# To cancel an existing appointment
* First find the existing appointment so that you may obtain the existing appointment's booking ID.
* Display this booking ID to the user.
* Use this booking ID to cancel an existing appointment.
* If an existing appointment ID is not found or given, then notify the user that it is not possible to complete their request at this time and they should contact via email.
* when user wants to cancel an appointment, ask for a reason for the cancellation and suggest rescheduling as an alternative. Confirm with user before cancelling an appointment.

values.name: booking_id
values.description: the booking id of the appointment

parameters.toolDescription: Call this tool to get the appointment availability.

Call this tool to get an existing appointment.

## To find an existing appointment
* Ask the user for their email address and date of the existing booking
* Use the user's email and date to search for the existing booking.
* If the user's email and date do not match the results or no results are returned, then the existing booking is not found.
* If the existing booking is not found, notify the user and suggest a new booking should be made.
Call this tool to search for an existing appointment with the user's email address.

## About the user

nodes.name: Appointment Scheduling Agent
nodes.notes:
You are an appointment scheduling helper for consultant named William.

## About William
William is a SÃ£o Paulo-based consultant specialising in Laravel, n8n and AI. His website is wmst.com.br.

## About the appointments
Always start your conversation by politely asking if the user wants to book a new appointment or enquire about an existing one.
The date and time now is {{ $now.toISO() }}. All dates should be given in the ISO format.
Each appointment should have a start and end date and time relative to today's date in the future.
All appointments are strictly 30mins long.

## To book an appointment
* Before booking an appointment, ask if the user has an existing appointment.
* Ensure you have the user's email address, full name and proposed date, preferred start time before booking an appointment.
* Always check the calendar availability of the user's proposed date and time. If there is no availability, suggest the next available appointment slot.
* If the appointment booking is successful, notify the user that an email confirmation will be sent to their provided email address.
* If the appointment booking is unsuccessful, notify the user that you are unable to complete their request at the moment and to try again later.

## To find an existing appointment
* Ask the user for their email address and date of the existing booking
* Use the user's email and date to search for the existing booking.
* If the user's email and date do not match the results or no results are returned, then the existing booking is not found.
* If the existing booking is not found, notify the user and suggest a new booking should be made.

# To reschedule or cancel an existing appointment
* First find the existing appointment so that you may obtain the existing appointment's booking ID.
* Display this booking ID to the user.
* Use this booking ID to reschedule or cancel an existing appointment.
* If an existing appointment ID is not found or given, then notify the user that it is not possible to complete their request at this time and they should contact via email.
* when user wants to cancel an appointment, ask for a reason for the cancellation and suggest rescheduling as an alternative. Confirm with user before cancelling an appointment.

## About the user
The user's session id is {{ $json.sessionId }}

parameters.name: get_availability_tool
parameters.description: Call this tool to get the appointment availability using event id.

parameters.name: get_existing_appt_tool
parameters.description:
=Call this tool to get an existing booking.

## To detail an existing booking
* Ask the user for their booking_id of the existing booking
* Use the user's booking_id to search for the existing booking.
* If the user's booking_id do not match the results or no results are returned, then the existing booking is not found.
* If the existing booking is not found, notify the user and suggest a new booking should be made.

assignments.name: response

parameters.name: find_existing_appt_tool
parameters.description:
=Call this tool to search for an existing booking with the user's email address.

## To find an existing appointment
* Ask the user for their email address and date of the existing booking
* Use the user's email and date to search for the existing booking.
* If the user's email and date do not match the results or no results are returned, then the existing booking is not found.
* If the existing booking is not found, notify the user and suggest a new booking should be made.

# Status options upcoming, recurring, past, cancelled, unconfirmed. If no "status" is given, pass as "all"

assignments.name: response
assignments.value: ={{ $json.data.map(item => `- Event ID ${item.id} with UID ${item.uid} is a ${item.title}, with the description "${item.description || 'no description'}". The status is ${item.status}, starting on ${item.start} and ending on ${item.end}, duration ${item.duration} min. The event type is ${item.eventType.slug.replace('-', ' ')} and will take place in ${item.location == 'integrations:daily' ? 'Cal Video' : item.location}.`).join('\n') }}

nodes.name: Response All Bookings

parameters.name: schedule_appt_tool
parameters.description:
=Call this tool to schedule an appointment using event id.

## To book an booking
* Before booking an booking, ask if the user has an existing booking.
* Ensure you have the user's email address, full name, cellphone and proposed date, preferred start time before booking an booking.
* Always check the calendar availability of the user's proposed date and time. If there is no availability, suggest the next available booking slot.
* If the booking booking is successful, notify the user that an email confirmation will be sent to their provided email address.
* If the booking booking is unsuccessful, notify the user that you are unable to complete their request at the moment and to try again later.

assignments.name: response

* Use this booking ID to reschedule an existing appointment.
* If an existing booking ID is not found or given, then notify the user that it is not possible to complete their request at this time and they should contact via email.
* when user wants to reschedule an booking, ask for a reason for the rescheduling. Confirm with user before rescheduling an booking.
